items.sentence: Tom is a chemistry teacher, and Mary is a music teacher.
You should tell Tom that Mary will very likely be there.
You should tell Tom that Mary isn't planning to do that.
What's right and what's wrong changes from time to time.
We're doing this because there's nothing else we can do.
Tom isn't really interested in dating anybody right now.
Tom lapsed into a coma and never regained consciousness.
What kinds of things do you like to do with your family?
Tom was looking forward to going to the dance with Mary.
Tom's windows were open a while ago. They're closed now.
